embed.description: **The Lumin Vase** is an item players may accumulate over a run.

fields.name: ||The Lumin Vase||
fields.value: ||Obtained by getting both **Broken Vase** and **Lumin Goop** when using 3 difficulty bells. When in deck, unlocks the true boss fight **Heart of the Storm** after defeating the **Eye of the Storm** battle||

embed.title: The Lumin Vase
